data.title: Great Bar on the Ave
data.text: If you don't like the loud edm dance scene then Bull Bar is ideal for your night out on the Ave. They have live bands that do a lot of covers from the 90s and 00s and the drink specials are pretty good for being on the ave. The place does get really crowded and smokey during prime going out hours. If you are looking for some drinks with a chill crowd then this place is worth a shot.

data.title: CRAZY BAR FOR PEOPLE WATCHING
data.text: This is one of the local bars on the  'Avenue' that is always packed on weekends, particularly at happy hour.  The only problem is that smoking is allowed so it can get a little thick from smoke.

data.title: Reminds me of a college bar (in a good way!)
data.text: Small place, friendly bartenders, and a variety of live music.  We've been there on a number of occasions for a couple after dinner drinks. Fun place to hang out.  Can get quite crowded though once the music kicks up.

data.title: Nice bar but beware
data.text: This is a nice bar to just come have a drink and chill, the later the better! Beware, my better half had her purse snatched off her chair with all her belongings, phone, DL, credit cards and the works! The bastards started using all the cards immediately and within a couple hours had thousands charged up around town! Poor Walgreens and BO stations, they got burned the worst! Went to the stores and the managers said it was quite normal and did not seem to care! I know it is not the bars fault, but they also did not seem to care. Just keep your belongings tight to yourself and don't let your guard down in Delray Beach areas, especially later in the evening.

data.title: It's a bar
data.text: It's a bar.  Bartenders are nice and helpful.  Can get crowded when musicians are playing there.  Nothing out of the norm for bars

data.title: Love Bull Bar!!!
data.text: Nice atmosphere - love to drop in on Monday nights when strolling Atlantic Avenue (not as crowded Monday night).  Matt is usually tending bar Monday and there is always great entertainment!!!

data.title: Incredible live music!!! Great atmosphere!!!
data.text: Love this place!!! What a great place to grab a drink and watch live music.  Recently stopped by on a Monday night and got to see an incredible band called The New Shift (rock/reggae) and other local acts joined the stage as well for a fun eclectic vibe.  Bartenders are very friendly (Matt was working Monday).  Great, fun crowd!!! Will be going back for sure!

data.title: Small place
data.text: Local place and not bad except they have no food. Bar tender was friendly band was entertaining. Place get super busy where you can't move

data.title: "MAHI MAHI"
data.text: While passing thru Del Ray Beach on business we found the MAHI . Some say Dorado, some say MAHI MAHI, in FL they call them dolphin. And everyone wants to catch a BIG BULL DOLPHIN! That's were the name comes from. Great location, great decor, great live music, and GREAT PEOPLE! The owner Alyce greeted us, not only a GREAT host but a BEAUTIFUL person. The bar tender Kiwi was cheery, funny, and attentive. A cool sophisticated  place to hang out.

data.title: fly by
data.text: Bull Bar is on my fly-by list. It is comfortable, clean, great staff, appetizers and drink menu options so we can stay for an hour then move on. Our fly-by list is my favorite and it is not easy to get on it. I wish Bull Bar had a Bordeaux, Burgundy or Red Zin by the glass though. Anyone of those things move a restaurant to 5 stars for us and a guaranteed visit every time. So far there are only 2.

data.title: down to earth people
data.text: I love this bar!!! They have great bands, beer specials and no line. But it always seems to be crowded[not slammed] Go there and listen to some music and grab a drink. You won't be disapointed.

data.title: Good place to hang
data.text: I go from time to time, great music, band is cool, bartenders are friendly and efficient, but when they serve a draft beer they are inconsistent, sometimes they pour 90 percent of it, let it rest, and pour the remaining, but sometimes they just pour it 90 percent full with a bunch of foam at the top, and then serve it. I was there yesterday- Saturday, and the male bartender did this. But that's my only complaint I have about the place, which is very minor.

data.title: so fun...if you can take smoke
data.text: great bands...open late each night...sell cigs til closing...fun fun crowd...very local...very hip....good mix of ages...have fun....

data.title: Great live music
data.text: This bar is on the west end of Atlantic Avenue, the main drag of Delray Beach.  the beers are reasonably priced and they usually have great live music on the weekends.  Always a good time.

data.title: Last of the smoker friendly bars
data.text: Locates at the corner of Atlantic Avenue and Swinton Avenue is the Bull Bar.  An unpretentious small town bar with big personality.  You must visit on a Tuesday when Ronnie is working the bar.  He will pour you a nice size drink, draw you a picture on the bar chalkboard, pop you a bag of popcorn and give you a massage ... Yup ... Right there on the bar stool!  The drinks are cheap, smoking is permitted, you can order take-out and have it delivered to the bar or even bring food from home.  Thursday and Friday Happy Hour offers a free buffet from a local chef ... All in all ... Cool place to have a drink and relax ... A really good value for Pre-dinner cocktails ... A local joint you will be happy you tried!

data.title: Weekend hangout
data.text: Like beer and drinks? Loud music and hot people? This is the place just where all the fun starts on Atlantic Ave.

data.title: Fun, Clean, Low-Key Bar
data.text: We visited Bull Bar on a Thursday for Happy Hour. Two for one microbrews! It was quiet but fun. They also had a huge complimentary buffet for customers drinking. Although we only had a few bites, it was super delicious Hawaiian-inspired food. If we lived in Florida, this would be a regular hang-out for us.

data.title: A real bar
data.text: Great bar. Doesn't pretend to be anything but a bar. Great live music. Ice cold drinks. Great beer. Great bartenders. Homerun. Must hit spot for a good tune and a perfect cocktail or brew.

data.title: What fun!
data.text: Go late when the band is playing.  Gets pretty wild in a good way.  Very friendly people and the drinks are terrific!

data.title: A fun local place to hang out!
data.text: Basically a bar, but a fun bar!  The entertainment (nightly except Monday) was great.  A local hangout for Delray Beach.  Smoking is permitted and the menu is somewhat limited.
